1379.name: OA 4370
1379.Applications:
Repair jobs where high strength and toughness is required. 
Joining austenitic manganese steels with themselves or with other steels. 
Buffer layer before hardfacing and maintenance on hard-to-weld steels.
Armour plate and Joining 14% manganese steels.
1379.Suitable_For: Tools steels* Low alloyed steels * Austenitic steels with Mn : type Z 120 M 12 Spring steels : 45S7*, 51S7*; 56SC7*, 45C4*, ...dissimilar welding
